page.content: In Matlock Bath there is{Holy Trinity {Church,}which is C.of E.The Parochial Church Hall is being repaired by voluntary effort and being brought back into use for cubs,youth club and others.Trinity Hall is used for,Church meetings.{St.Gile's Church}(C.of E) is the parish church of Matlock.An appeal for Â£60,000 to repair the church has just been started.{St.John's Church (C.of E)is a small church used occasionally.{St.Mary's Church}is near Cromford Meadows near the now closed tiny{Fishermans' Chapel.}Other churches and chapels in the area have been closed and converted into houses or businesses - a garage,a furniture store and builders.{The New Tribes {Mission}is an International Training Centre.{Willersley Castle}is a Methodist Holiday Centre.
